# nav-bar
nav-bar

Set menu icon color
```CSS
	.nav-bar {
		color: white;
	}
```

Set menu icon bar background color
```CSS
	.nav-tool {
		background: lightgreen;
	}
```

Set main list color
```CSS
	.nav-list-main {
		background: lightpink;
	}
```

Set sub list color
```CSS
	.nav-list-sub {
		background: lightblue;
	}
```
